entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Port Elgin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:43 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 3:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -9.0°C
Wind: ENE 25 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy or freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets changing to periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets at times mixed with light snow before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets at times mixed with light snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle changing to flurries in the evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
